Articles.Content: I am going to make a KSP movie. I want to have all the tech tree nodes unlocked, but keep the R&D facility only level two. Is there a way to do this?

Surprisingly, yes! With a mod.

sarbian's [Custom Barn Kit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121100) lets you set the science unlock limits by level for the R&D building. So you can set it to -1 (unlimited) at level 2 already instead of at level 3, and unlock nodes to your heart's contend.

All worship the sarbian! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
